public method Typeset::BOP::colon::string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in string: 7
sub string {
  my $self = shift;
  my ($lop,$rop) = ($self->{lop},$self->{rop});
  return $self->SUPER::string(@_) unless $lop->class eq 'Variable' &&
    $rop->class eq 'BOP' && $rop->{def}{isFnArrow};
  return $lop->string.': '.$rop->string;
}
public method Typeset::BOP::colon::TeX (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in TeX: 7
sub TeX {
  my $self = shift;
  my ($lop,$rop) = ($self->{lop},$self->{rop});
  return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_) unless $lop->class eq 'Variable' &&
    $rop->class eq 'BOP' && $rop->{def}{isFnArrow};
  return $lop->TeX.'\colon '.$rop->TeX;
}
